# <a name="replying-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-102">Outlook.com에서 회신</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-102">Replying in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-103">한 번에 한 메시지에 회신 하려면 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-103">To reply to one message at a time:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-104">메시지 목록에서 회신할 메시지를 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-104">In your message list, choose the message that you want to reply to.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-105">메시지 창의 오른쪽 위에 있는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-105">At the top right of the message pane, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-106">**회신** 또는</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-106">**Reply** or</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-107">**전체 회신**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-107">**Reply all**.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-108">메시지를 입력 하 고 **보내기를**선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-108">Type your message and then select **Send**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-109">모든 메시지에 자동으로 회신 하려면 다음을 수행 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-109">To automatically reply to all messages:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-110">이제 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-110">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
<span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-111">**설정** > **모든 Outlook 설정** > **메일** > **자동 회신** 을 보고 [자동 회신 설정을](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies)엽니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-111">**Settings** > **View all Outlook Settings** > **Mail** > **Automatic replies** to open your [Automatic replies settings](https://outlook.live.com/mail/options/mail/automaticReplies).</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-112">**자동 회신 켜기** 토글을 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-112">Select the **Turn on automatic replies** toggle.</span></span>
3. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-113">**시간 간격 중에만 회신 보내기** 확인란을 선택 하면 다음을 수행할 수 있습니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-113">Selecting the **Send replies only during a time period** check box enables you to:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-114">선택한 경우에만 회신을 보냅니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-114">Only send replies when you choose.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-115">기간을 설정 하지 않으면 자동 회신을 끌 때까지 유지 됩니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-115">If you don't set a time period, your automatic reply remains on until you turn it off.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-116">일정 차단</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-116">Block your calendar</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-117">새 초대를 자동으로 거절</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-117">Automatically decline new invitations</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-118">이 기간 동안 회의를 거절 및 취소합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-118">Decline and cancel my meetings during this period</span></span>
4. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-119">메시지 상자에 자리를 비운 동안 사용자에 게 보낼 메시지를 입력 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-119">In the message box, type a message to send to people during the time you're away.</span></span>
5. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-120">대화 상대 에게만 회신을 보내려면 **회신을 연락처에만 보내기** 확인란을 선택 합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-120">To only send replies to your contacts, select the **Send replies to contacts only** check box.</span></span>
6. <span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-121">**저장**을 선택합니다.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-121">Select **Save**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="c4d6d-122">[Outlook.com의 자동 전달](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)에 대해 자세히 알아보세요.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="c4d6d-122">Learn more about [automatic forwarding in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/14614626-9855-48dc-a986-dec81d07b1a0?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
